title: 809 27 "A Storm of Revenge! An Enraged Army Comes to Attack!"Transliteration: "Fukushū no Arashi! Ikari no Gundan Shūrai!" (Japanese:復讐の嵐 怒りの軍団襲来！) Directed by: Yusuke SuzukiStoryboarded by: Tetsuya Endō Tomohiro Nakayama October 15, 2017(2017-10-15)
transformers_text: 809 27 A Storm of Revenge An Enraged Army Comes to Attack Transliteration Fu kush no Arashi Ikari no Gund an Sh rai Japanese Directed by Yusuke Suzuki Story boarded by Tetsuya End Tomohiro Nakayama October 15 2017 2017 10 15 After hearing about Cracker's defeat Big Mom creates a big storm before sending a massive army out to take revenge on Luffy She then goes to meet with the V in smoke Family for lunch and as they exchange pleasantries Pudding asks Sanji via note to meet her in private later Outside Luffy Nami and King Baum watch as the enraged army heads toward them but a steadfast Luffy refuses to move from his waiting spot
tf_idf_text: storm revenge enrage army come attack transliteration kush arashi ikari gund rai japanese direct yusuke suzuki story board tetsuya end tomohiro nakayama october hearing cracker defeat big mom create big storm send massive army take revenge luffy go meet smoke family lunch exchange pleasantry pudding asks sanji via note meet private later outside luffy nami king baum watch enrage army head toward steadfast luffy refuse move wait spot
